answers.answer: Funny I always have protein in my urine since every check up and my OB never mentions it to me. It's great to hear that everything is OK :-)I have my next appointment on the 25th October, so I will be 28 weeks 4 days. I went in to the hospital to meet my midwife last week and my little one is still swimming around in there, she shows absolutely NO sign of settling into a position as of yet. We shall see next week. In my first pregnancy, my daughter was head down quick early and remained that way, but even at this stage for all of us, our babies still have time to move, some are late ones :-) I am under an enormous amount of stress -  a big diff. to my first pregnancy and maybe that is the reason why my little one is also highly active as well.Keep us informed!

Well I havent felt her as much the last few days. I am kinda worried about it. Maybe she could be moving into a different position? I just want the 28th to be here already. I will be 30w 4d at my next.appt.

as you get further along you wont feel her move as much......she is running out of roomi have one baby head down and one breech....i opted for the c-section anyway because i will be getting a tubal ligation after they are deliveredthe 28th is next week and will be here before you know itmy ob never says anything about my urine test so i dont know what happens with my urinehopefully she goes head down before your next appt
Yeah when they get bigger they move around less as they have less space to move, but they still give a mean punch or kick lol

question: Yesterday I had my 28 week check up. I go in every 2.weeks now because of my risk of preeclampsia. So I measured right at 28 weeks. I had trace of protien in my urine. Which they expected. My blood pressure is stable for the time being. Aubreys heartbeat was 158 and that is normally where it is. I go in at 30 weeks for my next appt and a growth ultrasound the day before my babyshower. I am hoping that she is not breech anymore at my u/s. If she is I will be looking.at doing a version to flip her. Which I really dont want to happen.
title: 28week update.
